node.detail_zh: 患者為伊利沙伯醫院 A6 病房感染個案，患有慢性心臟衰竭及糖尿病，7 月 12 日因跌倒及發燒而入住 A6 病房，因同一病格內另一病人染疫，被列為密切接觸者，其後確診。情況其後持續轉差，延至 8 月 1 日晚上 8 時 08 分離世。
node.detail_en: The patient was infected within ward A6 in Queen Elizabeth Hospital, with chronic heart failure and diabetes. She was admitted to ward A6 due to tripping and fever, and was listed as a close contact of a patient of the ward testing positive to the coronavirus. She later tested positive to the virus, her conditions deteriorated, and she passed away at 8:08 p.m., August 1.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房
groups.name_en: Queen Elizabeth Hospital's A6 internal medicine ward
groups.description_zh: 群組首名患者因長期病患於 7 月 12 日入住伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房，其後入住同一病房的 7 名病人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The first patient of the cluster was admitted to medical ward A6 at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on July 12. Other seven patients of the ward have thereafter been diagnosed positive for the virus.
